Reference

About BentoBox

BentoBox

BentoBox: Coordinate-based Genomic Visualization Package for R

Page layout functions

bb_pageCreate()

Create a page for a BentoBox layout

bb_pageGuideHide()

Remove guides from a BentoBox page

bb_pageGuideHorizontal()

Draw a horizontal guideline at a specified y-coordinate on a BentoBox page

bb_pageGuideShow()

Reshow guides drawn with bb_pageCreate, bb_pageGuideHorizontal, and bb_pageGuideVertical

bb_pageGuideVertical()

Draw a vertical guideline at a specified x-coordinate on a BentoBox page

bb_pagePlotPlace()

Place a BentoBox plot that has been previously created but not drawn

bb_pagePlotRemove()

Remove BentoBox plots and annotations

Reading functions

bb_readBigwig()

Read a bigWig file and return it as a data frame

bb_readHic()

Read a .hic file and return Hi-C data as a dataframe

Plotting functions

Genomics

bb_plotGenes()

Plot a gene track for a specified genomic region

bb_plotGenomeLabel()

Plot genomic coordinates along the x or y-axis of a BentoBox plot

bb_plotHicRectangle()

Plot a triangular Hi-C interaction matrix in a rectangular format

bb_plotHicSquare()

Plot a Hi-C interaction matrix in a square format

bb_plotHicTriangle()

Plot a Hi-C interaction matrix in a triangular format

bb_plotIdeogram()

Plot a chromosome ideogram with or without cytobands

bb_plotManhattan()

Plot a Manhattan plot

bb_plotPairs()

Plot paired-end genomic range elements

bb_plotPairsArches()

Plot paired-end genomic range data in an arch style

bb_plotRanges()

Plot genomic range elements in a pileup or collapsed format

bb_plotSignal()

Plot any kind of signal track data for a single chromosome

bb_plotTranscripts()

Plot gene transcripts in a pileup style for a single chromosome

Shapes and Basic Elements

bb_plotCircle()

Plot a circle within a BentoBox layout

bb_plotLegend()

Plot a legend

bb_plotPolygon()

Plot a polygon within a BentoBox layout

bb_plotRaster()

Plot a raster object within a BentoBox layout

bb_plotRect()

Plot a rectangle within a BentoBox layout

bb_plotSegments()

Draw a line segment within a BentoBox layout

bb_plotText()

Plot text within a BentoBox layout

External

bb_plotGG()

Plot a ggplot2 plot, gtable, or grob object in a BentoBox layout

Annotation functions

bb_annoDomains()

Annotate domains in a Hi-C plot

bb_annoGenomeLabel()

Annotate genomic coordinates along the x or y-axis of a BentoBox plot

bb_annoHeatmapLegend()

Add a color scale legend for heatmap-style plots

bb_annoHighlight()

Annotates a highlight box around a specified genomic region of a BentoBox plot

bb_annoPixels()

Annotate pixels in a Hi-C plot

bb_annoSegments()

Annotates a line segment within a BentoBox plot

bb_annoText()

Annotates text within a BentoBox plot

bb_annoXaxis()

Add an x-axis to a plot

bb_annoYaxis()

Add a y-axis to a plot

bb_annoZoomLines()

Annotates zoom lines for a specified genomic region of a BentoBox plot

Meta functions

bb_assembly()

Make a bb_assembly object for alternate TxDb, OrgDb,and BSgenome genomic annotation packages

bb_defaultPackages()

Display the default genomic annotation packages associated with a genome build

bb_genomes()

Display the included available default genome assemblies

bb_params()

bb_params: BentoBox parameters object

c()

Combine multiple bb_params objects into a vector

colorby()

Handle BentoBox color scaling parameters

bb_mapColors()

Maps a numeric or character vector to a color palette and returns the vector of colors

Contents

Developed by Nicole Kramer, Eric S. Davis, Craig Wenger, Douglas H. Phanstiel.

Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
